info.description:
# Furo MyST-NB CSS Fixes
> A tiny wrapper around a few lines of CSS to better support the MyST-NB Jupyter notebook outputs with the Furo Sphinx theme.

<!-- [![Tests](https://img.shields.io/github/workflow/status/kai-tub/furo-myst-nb-css-fixes/CI?color=dark-green&label=%20Tests)](https://github.com/kai-tub/furo-myst-nb-css-fixes//actions/workflows/main.yml) -->
